title: Liberal Cities Are Melting Down (Ep 1301)
description:
In this episode, I address the explosive weekend interview between President Trump and Fox News’ Chris Wallace. I also address the explosion of violence in Portland and the violent leftists behind it. 

News Picks:


10 policies the radical Democrats will push through if Joe Biden is elected.

Was there an FBI informant in the Trump White House? 


Are CDC employees sabotaging the Trump administration’s coronavirus response?


Arizona hospitalizations continue downward trend, yet the panic porn continues.

New study shows questions coronavirus spread in schools. 

Shocking declassified emails reveal that the FBI knew the collusion charges were a hoax from the start.

Stunning new information about the source of the dossier. 


Anti-Trumper Larry Hogan’s media honeymoon comes to an abrupt end. 

NY State troopers union threatens to pull out of NY City due to their outrageous new rules.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
